name: POWER PLAYER
description:
You are our Number One (#1) Super Power Player! Thank you for your patronage!

They don't make these things like they used to. Since the battery on your new console is pretty much fried, you're relying on your unreliable generator to keep your play session going.

FEATURES:

100+ Hours* of mind-numbing fun!

Accurate** technology*** simulation!

Online Scoreboard!

4**** Car Textures!

Programmer Art!

And More!*****
